name: MissionControlWeeklyBrief
summary: ATLAS mission control weekly brief for leadership alignment.
description: Tailor the weekly brief for ATLAS operations, aligning product, engineering, and go-to-market stakeholders on risks and commitments.
acceptance_criteria: Summarizes completed, in-progress, and blocked initiatives with responsible owners.
Highlights the top operational risks alongside mitigation steps and decision deadlines.
Links to source dashboards or tickets so leadership can verify status changes.

name: AutomationPolicyPrecheck
summary: ATLAS automation policy precheck for mission tooling changes.
description: Validate automation changes touching ATLAS mission control systems against governance, audit, and privacy controls before rollout.
acceptance_criteria: Confirms applicable automation and change-management policies for the proposed update.
Documents potential compliance risks with recommended mitigations or required approvals.
Records change ticket references and the go/no-go recommendation with accountable approvers.
